title: Fast-paced Chameleon Run game now available for free on Play Store (was $1.99)
text:
Are you looking for a new game to play on your Android device? If the answer is yes, we have some good news for you. The interesting Chameleon Run, which normally retails for $1.99, is now available for free. It comes from game developer Hyperbolic Magnetism and the publisher of Alto’s Adventure, Noodlecake Games.
Chameleon Run is a fast and challenging auto-runner. The goal of the game is to complete each individual level, which isn’t the easiest thing in the world to do. To get to the finish line, you have to switch your color to match the ground while you’re running and jumping from platform to platform. Take a look at the video below to get a feel for the gameplay.

The fast-paced game features a few different jumping mechanics like “double jump” and “head jump” and non-linear levels, each of which has three special objectives you have to complete. It’s very easy to play, as you only need to use two buttons. One for jumping and the other for changing your color.
See also: 15 best racing games for Android 4 days ago Chameleon Run is quite addictive and extremely fun to play. Those of you looking for a new game to keep you entertained might want to consider getting it, especially now while it’s free. However, it won’t be free forever, so get it while you still can. Visit the Google Play Store by clicking the button below to download it to your device.
